rooms.name: Crafts_Room
rooms.description: The Crafts Room contains the first group of bundles available. Completing all Crafts Room bundles repairs the bridge east of The Mines, unlocking the Quarry.

rooms.name: Pantry
rooms.description: The Pantry appears after completing one bundle. Completing all Pantry bundles will restore the dilapidated Greenhouse on the farm, making it available to grow Crops, Fruit Trees, and Trees year-round.

rooms.name: Fish_Tank
rooms.description: The Fish Tank appears after completing one bundle. Completing all Fish Tank bundles will remove the Glittering Boulder to the left of The Mines entrance. Willy will also give the player a Copper Pan that can be used to collect metal ores and other items from bodies of water.

items.name: Sunfish
items.origin: Found in Rivers, 6am – 7pm, Spring and Summer during sunny weather

items.name: Catfish
items.origin: Found in Rivers and Secret Woods, 6am – midnight, Spring and Fall. Only when raining. Can be found in Summer during rain in the Secret Woods and Witch's Swamp, Winter with a Rain Totem

items.name: Shad
items.origin: Found in Rivers, 9am – 2am, Spring, Summer, and Fall. Only when raining

items.name: Tiger Trout
items.origin: Found in Rivers, 6am – 7pm, Fall and Winter. Can be found in any weather

items.name: Largemouth Bass
items.origin: Found in the Mountain Lake, 6am – 7pm, All Seasons

items.name: Carp
items.origin: Found in the Mountain Lake, Anytime, during Spring, Summer, or Fall. Found in Secret Woods or Sewer, Anytime, All Seasons

items.name: Bullhead
items.origin: Found in the Mountain Lake, Anytime, All Seasons

items.name: Sturgeon
items.origin: Found in the Mountain Lake, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter

items.name: Sardine
items.origin: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Spring, Fall, and Winter

items.name: Tuna
items.origin: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter

items.name: Red Snapper
items.origin: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Fall. Only when raining

items.name: Tilapia
items.origin: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 2pm, Summer and Fall

items.name: Walleye
items.origin: Found in Rivers, the Mountain Lake, and Cindersap Forest Pond, 12pm – 2am, Fall (Winter with Rain Totem.) Only when raining

items.name: Bream

items.name: Eel
items.origin: Found in the Ocean, 4pm – 2am, Spring or Fall. Only when raining

items.name: Ghostfish

items.name: Sandfish

items.name: Woodskip
items.origin: Found in the Secret Woods and the Forest Farm, Anytime, All Seasons

rooms.name: Boiler_Room
rooms.description: The Boiler Room appears after completing two bundles. Completing all Boiler Room bundles repairs the Minecarts, allowing the player to fast travel between distant locations. The Locations are Bus Stop, Mines, Quarry and Town.

items.name: Copper_Bar
items.origin: Smelting Copper Ore in the Furnacer

items.name: Iron_Bar
items.origin: Smelting Iron Ore in the Furnace, Crafting the 'Transmute (Fe)' recipe

items.name: Gold_Bar
items.origin: Smelting Gold Ore in the Furnace, Crafting the 'Transmute (Au)' recipe

items.name: Quartz
items.origin: Foraging on all floors of The Mines

items.name: Earth_Crystal
items.origin: Foraging on floors 1-39 of The Mines, Geodes, Omni Geodes, drop from Duggies in the Mines (floors 6-29)

items.name: Frozen_Tear
items.origin: Foraging on floors 41-79 of The Mines, Frozen Geodes, Omni Geodes, drop from Dust Sprites in the Mines (floors 41-79)

items.name: Fire_Quartz
items.origin: Foraging on floors 81-119 of The Mines, Magma Geodes, Omni Geodes

items.name: Slime
items.origin: Dropped by Slimes

items.name: Bat_Wing
items.origin: Dropped by Bats in The Mines or the Skull Cavern

items.name: Solar_Essence
items.origin: Dropped by Ghosts, Squid Kids, or Metal Heads in The Mines, dropped by Mummies or Iridium Bats in the Skull Cavern; produced by Sunfish in Fish Ponds; buy from Krobus

items.name: Void_Essence
items.origin: Dropped by Shadow Brutes or Shadow Shamans in The Mines or Serpents in the Skull Cavern; produced by Void Salmon in Fish Ponds; buy from Krobus

rooms.name: Bulletin_Board
rooms.description: The Bulletin Board appears after completing three bundles. Completing all Bulletin Board bundles improves the player's friendship rating with every non-datable villager by two hearts (500 points). Note that this applies only to non-datable villagers whom the player has met in person. Villagers who do not show on the 'Social' tab of the player menu and villagers whose names appear as '???' will not receive 500 points.

rooms.name: Vault
rooms.description: The Vault becomes available after completing four bundles. Pressing the large 'purchase' button will purchase the bundle and deduct the gold from the total.

rooms.name: Abandoned_JojaMart
rooms.description: After completing the Community Center, the first night before a rainy or stormy day, a cutscene will trigger in which a bolt of lightning strikes the abandoned JojaMart, opening its doors. Inside, the Missing Bundle can be found.
